Test Name: Lipoprotein (a) and Low-Density Lipoprotein Cholesterol, Serum
Purpose: To quantitatively measure Lipoprotein (a) and LDL-cholesterol in serum to aid clinical diagnosis and patient management.
Container: Plain red-top tube or serum separator tube (SST)
Equipment: Automated chemistry analyzer (e.g., Siemens or Roche platform)
